pkgmetadata.longdescription: Calculate the Compressibility Factor 'z' for Hydrocarbon Gases // Computational algorithms to solve equations and find the compressibility factor (z). Correlations available: Hall- Yarborough, Dranchuk-AbuKassem, Dranchuk-Purvis-Robinson, Beggs-Brill and a Artificial Neural Network correlation Kamyab et al . It uses the original Standing-Katz chart for statistical comparison and plotting.
